import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' const DetailBlog = ({posts}) => { let { id } = useParams(); const post = posts.find(post =>post.id == id); return (
{/* tittle heading */}

Chi Tiết Sản Phẩm

{post.content} $1300.00

  • {/* {product.detail} */}
) } DetailBlog.propTypes = { } export default DetailBlog
